name: Mission-Driven Tech
description: For women that have to receive brachytherapy (internal radiation therapy), we have designed a patient-centered device that minimizes discomfort, improves procedure safety, patient outcomes and access to care.
one_liner: For women that have to receive brachytherapy (internal radiation therapy), we have designed a patient-centered device that minimizes discomfort, improves procedure safety, patient outcomes and access to care.
